name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Dreamseeking Voyage
storyline: Under this starry sky, the world has long since died, and civilization is just a bubble... But even so, you have to find your own future, right?
summary:
Version 7.3 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the beginning of Part 2 of the main story, which includes:
• New Part 2 Story Chapter 1: Hundred Years of Solitary Shadow
• New S Rank Valkyrie: Deepspace Anchor: First Light (Senadina)
• New A Rank Valkyries: Valkyrie Boltstorm (Helia) & Valkyrie Blastmetal (Coralie)
• New Story Exploration Mode
• New Permanent Realms of Battle Mode
• New Featured Event: A Feast Sought in Data
• New AstralOp System
• New AstralOps: Songque & Dreamseeker
• Supply System Rework
• Continued UI Overhaul
• Removal of Coop Modes
• ...and more!
